articleinfo.title: Week 11 Exercise: Fork and Pull Request

listitem.para: Fork my ece2524 repository to create your own copy on your personal github account.
Clone the forked repo from your own github account to your local machine.

Modify the week11/Makefile to add a target named archive that when invoked creates a compressed tar archive of the project source files (including the Makefile itself, but excluding any auto-generated files such as binary object files) OR create a Makefile in the project base directory that contains targets 'docs', 'week10', 'week11' that will invoke the Makefile in the doc, week10, or week11, respectively.
Commit your changes, push back to your github user account and then click the "Pull Request" button on github to send a request to me to review your changes.
